methods.name: node_model
methods.docstring_summary: Construct a node from a GraphModel

node.description: The graph model to generate the node definition from.

methods.name: node
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a graph Node, which may be filtered using any label/s and/or property/properties.

labels.description: The label (or list of labels) for that node

ref_name.description: A reference name to be used later in the rest of the query

properties.description: A dict representing the set of properties by which the nodes are filtered
